Headline: #65 Grand Temporary Reroute at Grand/Orleans.
ShortDescription: #65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois and Orleans, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#65 Grand buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Grand, Wells, Illinois, Orleans, then resume their normal route on Grand, due to a street blockage near Grand/Orleans.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Howard-bound Red Line Trains Bypassing Sox-35th Station
ShortDescription: Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Sox-35th station due to police activity.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Howard-bound Red Line trains are running, but not stopping at Sox-35th station due to police activity.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

  • As a result of the delay, shuttle buses are requested from 63rd/Dan Ryan to Roosevelt to provide connecting service in both directions.

We apologize for this inconvenience and appreciate your understanding.
